data.title: Tuneful Reflections: A Comparative Analysis of Shelley and Faiz As Romantic Poets
data.meta_description: Tuneful Reflections: A Comparative Analysis of Shelley and Faiz as Romantic Poets - Free download as PDF File (.pdf), Text File (.txt) or read online for free. This document is a dissertation submitted to the University of Calicut in partial fulfillment of the requirements for a Master of Arts degree in English Language and Literature. It examines the comparative analysis of Percy Bysshe Shelley and Faiz Ahmad Faiz as Romantic poets. The dissertation was written by Keloth Harsha Jyothi under the supervision of Shahana K.M. It includes declarations, certificates, acknowledgements and outlines the table of contents which will compare Shelley and Faiz's ideologies of art through their poetry. The introduction provides background on poetry and its universal appeal, as well as the role of writers during times of crisis. It argues that Shelley and Faiz remained true to their art and representation
data.text: Tuneful Reflections: A Comparative Analysis of Shelley and Faiz As Romantic Poets
